result:
.content
	.content__head
		.content__title Category
		//- template(v-if="!isMobile && !isTablet")
		.content__options
			button.content__option(v-for="item in options" type="button" @click="activeType = item" :class="{content__option_active: activeType == item}") {{ item }}
		//- template(v-else)
		v-select(:options="options" class="content__select" :clearable="false" :searchable="false" v-model="activeType")
	.content__cards
		transition-group(name="card")
			card-default(
				v-for="(item, index) in paginatedData" 
				:key="index" 
				:label="item.label" 
				:bgImage="item.bgImage"
				)
	paginate(
		:page-count="pageCount"
		:container-class="'pagination'"
		:prev-text="prev"
		:next-text="next"
		:click-handler = "clickCallback"
		:page-class="'pagination-item'"
	)
